page.title: 02Farming
page.content:
The farms in this area are mixed farms.They keep cattle, sheep and grow crops including wheat, barley, oats, oilseed rape, turnips, potatoes, and grass for hay and silage.
This is the pattern of the farmers year in our area - {January -}Ploughing and live stock attendance {February -}Feed cattle and sheep. {March -}Calving cows (Spring calving) {April -}Lambing. {May -}Spraying, Fertiliser spreading {June}- Silage. {July -}Hay Cutting. {August -}Harvest. {September -}Calving and Harvest. {October -}Sow winter wheat. {November -}ploughing. {December -}Fatten lambs on rape.
